title: Data Loss Prevention
text: Regular backups ensure that data is not permanently lost due to unexpected events.

title: System Failures
text: In case of hardware or software failures, backups provide a way to restore data.

title: Cyber Attacks
text: Backups can help recover data after a cyber attack, such as ransomware.

hintAnswer: prevent data loss in case of system failures or cyber attacks
title: Choose the Correct Reason
text: Select the primary reason for regular data backups in a business environment.
choices: prevent data loss in case of system failures or cyber attacks
